TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OneWayBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class OneWayBindingElement Inherits BindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension
type OneWayBindingElement = class inherit BindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 启用数据包路由和单向方法的使用。

span.span: Enables packet routing and the use of one-way methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要启用数据包路由*单向转换*层是必需的此类提供。To enable packet routing a *one-way conversion* layer is required, which this class provides. 此类是绑定堆栈中的一个绑定，该绑定执行称为 `OneWayBindingElement` 的消息级形状更改。This class is a binding in the stack of bindings that performs a message-level shape change called `OneWayBindingElement`. 此形状更改可采用 或 ，将它作为 公开，或者与此相反，采用 或 ，将它作为 公开。This shape change can take a or a and expose it as a , or conversely it can take a or a and expose it as a . 用户可以创建一个自定义绑定，将此绑定置于具有会话功能或请求/答复传输的上层，使之可进行数据包路由。A user can create a custom binding that layers this binding over a session-aware or request-reply transport to make it packet routable. 如果希望以更自然的方式公开单向方法，此类也十分有用。This class is also useful when you want to expose one-way methods in a more native fashion. 在这一层上可应用更多的转换，如复合双工和可靠消息。More transformations can be applied over this layer, such as Composite Duplex and Reliable Messaging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接收绑定上下文作为输入参数，该参数表示绑定元素的堆栈。This method receives a binding context as an input parameter, which represents the stack of binding elements. 堆栈中的每个绑定元素都可以独立处理查询或委托查询，或两种功能都具备。Each binding element in the stack can handle the inquiry itself or delegate the inquiry, or a combination of the two. 如果委托查询，每个绑定元素都可以修改上下文。Each binding element can modify the context if it delegates the inquiry. 但是，传输绑定元素独立处理查询。However, a transport binding element handles the inquiry itself. 此方法由绑定元素以及运行时对象（例如 、 和 ）实现。This method is implemented by binding elements as well as by the runtime objects, such as , , and .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用数据包路由。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether packet routing is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用数据包路由，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if packet routing is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可以选择使用转换的消息级协议`DuplexSessionChannel` / `RequestChannel` / `ReplyChannel`成单向通道，并允许对已转换通道的消息进行路由。This class can optionally use a message-level protocol that transforms a `DuplexSessionChannel`/`RequestChannel`/`ReplyChannel` to a one-way channel and allows the messages from the transformed channel to be routed. 属性会控制此协议的使用。Usage of this protocol is controlled by the property. 当此属性是`true`后,`DuplexSessionChannel`启动 （例如缓冲 TCP 和命名管道），此类添加的消息标头 (MustUnderstand = `false`，签名启用了安全设置)，在语义上意味着"可以数据包路由此通道"。When this property is `true`, upon `DuplexSessionChannel` initiation (for example, Buffered TCP and Named Pipes), this class adds a message header (MustUnderstand = `false`, signed if security is enabled) that semantically means "you can packet-route this channel". 对于接受程序端，此属性为 `true` 时，此类将在通道上接受的第一个消息中查找该标头。On the acceptor side, when this property is `true`, this class looks for this header in the first message received on the channel. 如果此标头不存在，WCF 会使通道出错。If this header does not exist, WCF faults the channel. 如果标头存在，然后 WCF 都新通道到共享的输入通道。If the header exists, then WCF funnels the new channel into a shared input channel. 要转换的请求-答复通道 （例如，TCP 流式处理或 HTTP） 当此属性是`true`，此标头添加到每个请求，以指示请求可以路由数据包。To transform a Request-Reply channel (for example, TCP Streaming or HTTP) when this property is `true`, this header is added to every request to signal that the request can be packet routed. WCF 还验证`SendRequest`返回`null`和使用回复`null`服务器上。WCF also verifies that `SendRequest` returns `null` and replies with `null` on the server.

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy(class System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter exporter, class System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext context) cil managed

virtual void System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy(System::ServiceModel::Description::MetadataExporter ^ exporter, System::ServiceModel::Description::PolicyConversionContext ^ context) = System::ServiceModel::Description::IPolicyExportExtension::ExportPolicy;

param.name: exporter
param.span: 可以用来修改导出过程的 。

span.span: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.

param.name: context
param.span: 可以用来插入您的自定义策略断言的 。

span.span: The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.

summary.span: 导出表示单向绑定元素的自定义策略断言。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion that represents the one-way binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与绑定相关的语句写入特定协定公开的 WSDL 信息，WCF 用于向客户端通信的绑定堆栈中此自定义绑定元素存在。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by WCF to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 此方法接受两个参数： 和 对象。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 使用 , 和 方法以获取从不同范围导出的策略断言的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 然后，使用此方法将您自己的策略断言添加到适当的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 属性可公开正在导出的终结点的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 这样，此方法就可正确限定它们的导出策略断言的范围。This enables this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，代码中的安全属性可以将行为添加到指示安全策略断言应该添加到的位置的 。For example, security attributes in code can add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 一旦将自定义策略断言附加到 WSDL 信息，客户端就可以通过实现 接口来检测和导入自定义绑定断言。Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.

span.span: is .
